TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:
> 
> What about set the main part as: Main Download (containing the space shuttle and all of its basic parts, including docking module). After that, set another category as : Suggested Downloads or something like that. If it helps any, take a look at RO and/or RSS and how they do it set it!

Will do

Just want to throw this out there, all of Raidernick's packs were all re-released (with permission) by Probus, the thread is called Historical Probe Packs. Don't have a link but it shouldn't be too difficult for you guys to find.

Edit: Nevermind my title is wrong but here [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125397-Historical-Rockets-Probes-and-Stations](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125397-Historical-Rockets-Probes-and-Stations)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-07T22:32:05Z" title="07/07/2015 10:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 7, 2015</time> by FlyMeToTheMinmus**

> 
> Just want to throw this out there, all of Raidernick's packs were all re-released (with permission) by Probus, the thread is called Historical Probe Packs.

Ah hah. I knew it had hisyorical in there somewhere

> 
> 1. Yes I left it like that to make it more hands on and interactive.
> 2. I probably misaligned the ladder collider in unity. My bad.
> 
> 3. I will see if I can edit this in....
> 
> 4. Engine brakes? You mean tail speed brake? Or...
> 
> 5. So it is inverted.... ok will edit config for it
> 
> Thanks

Sorry. I meant landing gear brakes. When I set the brakes and land I come to a stop in 4-6 seconds.

I just want to help finding bugs, no offence if it sounded like that ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I really like what you did so far!

EDIT:

And yes I used the right boosters. And I would really like to use the node to align. But it simply doesn't work for me. Is it just me? It's like the main part of the shuttle doesn't has a connection to the separator when I use the nodes.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-07T22:45:35Z" title="07/07/2015 10:45  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 7, 2015</time> by stulleman**

> 
> This mod s gonna be big. Loving it!
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> I guess I could sent him a message first. 
> 
> If he left he may not reply?
> 
> Otherwise I can get to work on the other sats and the bay holder
> 
> But I have the FSS to upload tonight. Infernal robotics is required. 
> 
> Once 1.7 is bug free I will official upload it but not as css to avoid compatibility issues with any future CSS mod. 
> 
> We need a name for this mod
> 
> So far I have STS or kerbal shuttle system. Maybe nasa pack? But could be copyright issues?
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Did you use the booster separator? It is basically there as a stock separator replacement to look realistic. I made it node attach so they line up correctly

NASA distributes all content for educational use. NASA is also funded by the government as such there is no copyright issue. I like KSS (Kerbal Shuttle System it is easy to remember and does not overlap with KSO.

> 
> Sorry. I meant landing gear brakes. When I set the brakes and land I come to a stop in 4-6 seconds.
> I just want to help finding bugs, no offence if it sounded like that ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I really like what you did so far!
> 
> EDIT:
> 
> And yes I used the right boosters. And I would really like to use the node to align. But it simply doesn't work for me. Is it just me? It's like the main part of the shuttle doesn't has a connection to the separator when I use the nodes.

The boosters were actually harder to place before lol.

Yes the nodes on tank are just there to line it up. I should just paint a marker on the tank for alignment...

I will upload a new prebuilt craft file when I can

I will make it easier in next release.

And also I have new landing gear that I really need to get back to and make available.

Just another thing I found regarding the canadarm.

The base seems to be wrong orientated. When I change the direction it rotates around the wrong axis. (Maybe some blender thing)

> 
> Just another thing I found regarding the canadarm.
> The base seems to be wrong orientated. When I change the direction it rotates around the wrong axis. (Maybe some blender thing)

Will fix tonight thanks

F 117 wheeeeeeee

Hey, mike, just want you to know that with my requests, you do not need to rush yourself to complete them. I intended them as suggestions as you have time. If this pack was just the shuttle launch system, i'd be happy. Just wanted to clarify that i am in no way demanding stuff. I would like to avoid being a part of the cause of another burnout.

> 
> Hey, mike, just want you to know that with my requests, you do not need to rush yourself to complete them. I intended them as suggestions as you have time. If this pack was just the shuttle launch system, i'd be happy. Just wanted to clarify that i am in no way demanding stuff. I would like to avoid being a part of the cause of another burnout.

Quite the opposite with model requests. I like doing them and showing them off haha.

No what im not good at is if I mess up the mod badly and get a flood of issues and try to fix it again quickly.... 

Or being told its not release ready repeatedly when I have stated its in development. 

So yeah.

There is no real order to models I put into the game and get sidetracked sometimes..

scripted with engines as part of the fuselage and not an addon so the config is interesting haha.

But odviously not part of nasa...

Uhm maybe itd be better to get the non Nasa stuff in an own bundle...imho itd be neat to have everything according to its origins...or somewhat. Anyway, amazing work as usual.

Hoping for this weekend when I can get some work done

**Can we all please take a moment** and show our support and appreciation for Jeasts amazing work that he has done so far on this mod. with the new cockpit, saving the css with his functional aero work and the new canadarm on the way

I know there have been times he has saved us from the mess I make sometimes and got us all hyped up with these new features.

It is a lonely night for me here tonight, as my right hand man may be leaving us, and this crazy all over the show environment I have put him in.

I appreciate all you have done Jeast, and everything you have taught me along the way!

Seconded. I said it several times in this thread, you guys did it. Not more, not less. 

Thanks a lot from my side. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You BOTH deserve many accolades!! The work you're doing well undoubtedly leave us with the best shuttle mod, and so much more.
